metadata.title: Bitcoin Depot appoints Scott Buchanan as CEO, Elizabeth Simer as COO
metadata.description: Bitcoin Depot (BTM) announced a planned leadership transition designed to support the Company’s long-term strategy, operational scaling, and M&A objectives. Bitcoin Depot’s Board of Directors has appointed Scott Buchanan, the Company’s current President and COO, as CEO, effective January 1, 2026. Also at that time, Brandon Mintz, Founder, CEO, and Chairman of the Board, will move out of the CEO role and continue as Executive Chairman, dedicating more time to shaping Bitcoin Depot’s strategic vis
metadata.keywords: Scott Buchanan, strategic leadership, leadership transition, Brandon Mintz, Chairman of the Board, CEO role, Opportunity Financial, Elizabeth Simer
